alert.note: Alert for Alger; Delta; Marquette; Menominee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:43AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Delta, Menominee, southeastern Marquette and southwestern Alger Counties through 730 AM EDT/630 AM CDT/... At 643 AM EDT/543 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Little Presque Isle to near Menominee. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marquette, Escanaba, Menominee, Presque Isle, Gladstone, Negaunee, Watson, Rapid River, Stephenson, Powers, Chatham, Little Presque Isle, Trenary, La Branche, K. I. Sawyer Airport, Rock, K I Sawyer, Trowbridge Park, U.S. 41 between Trenary and Rapid River and Deerton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
